member.name: T:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData
member.summary: AssemblyData holds the file path to the assembly so it can be loaded and the collection of modules in the assembly.

member.name: M:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection{ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.ModuleData})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Specify the path to the assembly and the collection of modules.
member.param: Collection of modules contained in the assembly.

member.name: P:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the assembly.

member.name: P:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the assembly is enabled or disabled. Nullable to handle three state checkbox.

member.name: P:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.FilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to assembly.

member.name: P:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.Modules
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of modules contained in the assembly.

member.name: P:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.Loader
member.summary: Gets the AssemblyLoader to load/unload this assembly. Ignored by the XmlSerializer when saving the configuration.

member.name: P:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.Assembly
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual Assembly of this AssemblyData.

member.name: M:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.Load
member.summary: Load this assembly.

member.name: M:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.Unload
member.summary: Unload this assembly.

member.name: M:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.LoadUnload
member.summary: Loads all assemblies with checked boxes and unloads the unchecked ones.

member.name: M:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.AreAnyModulesChecked
member.summary: Checks to see if any modules in the assembly are checked or enabled.
member.returns: True if any ModuleData's are checked, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.AreAllModulesChecked
member.summary: Checks to see if all modules in the assembly are checked or enabled.
member.returns: True if all ModuleData's are checked, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModuleManager.ModuleObjects.Classes.AssemblyData.ToString
member.summary: Overrides the ToString method and formats the string output.
member.returns: A desired format for the assembly.
